logic

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • logic.Actor
      • logic.Movable
        • logic.Entity
          • logic.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Collidable, Updatable

    public class Player
extends Entity
    The player is controlled by the user. It can shoot bullets to kill enemies, jump, move left and right, and die. Also able to win the game by reaching the Chalice and lose by dying. The player spawns at the beginning of the game at the player spawn.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
